Recalculate SGK and patient payment amounts for sales.

Assign devices to a patient with sale record creation.

This is the main endpoint for device assignment workflow:
1. Creates a Sale record
2. Creates DeviceAssignment records for each device
3. Handles pricing calculation (SGK, discounts)
4. Manages stock movements (if delivery_status is 'delivered')
5. Creates payment plan if needed

patch.description:
Update a device assignment with full legacy logic:
- Pricing recalculation when base_price, discount, sgk_scheme change
- Sale totals sync after updates
- Delivery status change handling (stock deduction when changed to 'delivered')
- Report status updates
- Loaner device management (add/remove/swap loaner with stock tracking)
- Serial number updates
- Down payment sync to PaymentRecord
- Status cancellation with stock return

post.description: Return a loaner device to stock.

post.description:
Development helper: for each image in the repo images/ folder, run OCR, extract name and tc_partial,
then insert a Patient record with a generated valid TC that contains the partial substring.
This endpoint is intended for local/dev only and makes a best-effort to avoid duplicate inserts.

Get a presigned URL for direct S3 upload

Request Body:
    filename (str): Original filename
    folder (str): Target folder (e.g., 'sms_documents', 'invoices')
    content_type (str): File content type (optional)
    
Returns:
    JSON: {
        'url': str,
        'fields': dict,
        'key': str
    }

This endpoint exists solely to force Pydantic to generate OpenAPI schemas 
for models that are required by the frontend/SDK but not yet used 
in active API endpoints.

ActivityLogRead.title: ActivityLogRead
ActivityLogRead.description: Schema for reading an activity log

tenantCount.title: Tenantcount
tenantCount.description: Number of tenants using this addon

CampaignRead.title: CampaignRead
CampaignRead.description: Schema for reading a campaign - matches Campaign.to_dict() output

CampaignSendRequest.title: CampaignSendRequest
CampaignSendRequest.description: Specific request model for triggering campaign send/preview

DeviceAssignmentItemCreate.title: DeviceAssignmentItemCreate
DeviceAssignmentItemCreate.description: Single device assignment item within a batch assignment request.

ear.title: Ear
ear.description: Ear side: L, R, or B (both)

InvoiceRead.title: InvoiceRead
InvoiceRead.description: Schema for reading invoice data - matches Invoice.to_dict() output

PatientRead.title: PatientRead
PatientRead.description: Schema for reading patient data - matches Patient.to_dict() output

tenantCount.title: Tenantcount
tenantCount.description: Number of tenants using this plan

ResponseEnvelope.title: ResponseEnvelope
ResponseEnvelope.description:
Standard response envelope for all API responses.
Matches the existing Flask 'success_response' format.

ResponseEnvelope_List_Union_DeviceAssign.title: ResponseEnvelope[List[Union[DeviceAssignmentUpdate, InstallmentPayment, PasswordChangeRequest, PatientSearchFilters, PaymentPlanCreate, PermissionRead, SMSHeaderRequestUpdate, SMSLogRead, SMSProviderConfigCreate, TenantStats, UserProfile]]]

RoleRead.title: RoleRead
RoleRead.description: Schema for reading a role - matches Role.to_dict() output

SaleRead.description: Schema for reading a sale - matches Sale.to_dict() output

SupplierRead.description: Schema for reading a supplier - matches Supplier.to_dict() output
